snippet.title: 20 Minutes Till Dawn - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: See the bullet hell gameplay of 20 Minutes Till Dawn in this trailer for the survival roguelite where endless hordes of creatures lurk from the dark. Craft an array of overpowering builds and eradicate waves of Lovecraftian nightmares. Will you be able to survive the night? 20 Minutes Till Dawn Version 1.0 is available on PC.
